# isSnapshot

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the object is a snapshot of a racing wheel.

## Declaration

```swift
var isSnapshot: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the racing wheel is a snapshot at a moment in time of a real device; otherwise, it’s an actual racing wheel.

## Creating snapshots

- **capture()**: Returns a snapshot of the racing wheel with its current element values.

items.description: Returns a snapshot of the racing wheel with its current element values.
